profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by user nysyecm.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Correspondence and business documents from Louis Henley, owner and boat builder at Phoenix Boat Yard in Phoenix, NY

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research use.

bioghist.p: Louis Henley was the owner of Phoenix Boat Yard in Phoenix NY, where he built, repaired, and launched various types of boats.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence and business documents of Louis Henley, owner of Phoenix Boat Yard, including invoices and receipts for materials purchased, checks, and advertisements. The bulk of the material dates from 1906 to 1909.

userestrict.p: The museum is providing access to these materials for personal, educational, and research purposes only. Prior permission from the Erie Canal Museum is required for any other use.
